page.title: 11The Roads
page.content: The roads form a good network with smooth{main roads}but no pavements. There are four main roads leading out of Bransgore to Ringwood, Burley, Highcliffe and Christchurch. On the Highcliffe route you cross the A35 which goes to Lyndhurst. When you go to Chritchurch from Bransgore you pass through Winkton which is a little village. There are quite a few estates and they have smooth well kept roads. The Ringwood Road has recently had part of it paved near the shops.The{country {lanes}are narrow and uneven.Two cars can only pass at laybys.The hedges stick out sometimes and hit the cars.The hedge cutter comes along twice a year.In the winter the main roads are cleared of snow but the lanes are often left blocked.
